channel.title: Settings are lost after restarting the game
channel.description: The settings in the tab "Black Mesa" and "Audio" are always reset after restarting the game. All other settings stay the way they should be.

item.title: Settings are lost after restarting the game
item.dc:creator: nonplusultra
item.description:
The settings in the tab “Black Mesa” and “Audio” are always reset after restarting the game. All other settings stay the way they should be.

Read full topic
item.source: Settings are lost after restarting the game
